pages.title: Heavy Bomb
pages.text: $(bold)When the little ones just aren't enough...$() Stack nose->tail: ordinance_heavy_warhead, ordinance_core, and either ordinance_fins or ordinance_thruster. Place horizontally with the warhead toward your target.

pages.name: Layout
pages.text: Left to right = tail to nose. T is fins or thruster at the rear; H points toward the target.
